channel.title: CVE Feed for GitLab -- DAST
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GitLab -- DAST

item.title: CVE-2022-4317|2024-08-03T01:34:50.152Z -- gitlab -- dast
item.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab DAST analyzer affecting all versions starting from 1.47 before 3.0.51, which sends custom request headers in redirects.

item.title: CVE-2022-3767|2024-08-03T01:20:57.589Z -- gitlab -- dast
item.description: Missing validation in DAST analyzer affecting all versions from 1.11.0 prior to 3.0.32, allows custom request headers to be sent with every request, regardless of the host.
